page.title: 10A DAY IN MY LIFE A.PHAROH
page.content: My name is Andrea Pharoh. I am 12 years old, I live in Raby Street, Gateshead and I attend Lyndhurst School. On a school day I get up at 7.45am and have my breakfast, which is usually a bowl of Frosties. Then I get washed and put on my school uniform. At 8.15am I leave the house and walk to a friend's house, a few minutes away. Then we go to catch a bus to school. School starts at 9.00am when we are registered. At 11.10 there is a break of 15 minutes when the tuck shop is open. Lunch is 12.20 to 1.25pm and school ends at 3.30pm. I usually have a big dinner at tea time and then help my mam wash up. At 6.00pm I go out. On Monday's I go to the Guides and on other nights I go out with friends. At 9.30pm I often have a bath and then watch television until 10.30 when I go to bed.
